attributes.additional_details:
Councils own £millions worth of land sat vacant/brownfield. But where?

Land Registry allows you to search (for cost) for ownership of a specific piece of land...
But what if you want to set up an allotment site in your district or a developer wanting to build new houses.

How do you find what land local authorities own?
How do you ensure that publically owned land isn't being sold off without consultation?

Please sign this petition to force councils and government to publish in a clear, transparent way what land (& building) assets they own/manage
